Name: Dangerous Blaster
About the game: Dangerous Blaster is a demanding high score based single player arena game in which you take control of an alien equipped with a weapon with special properties; if your projectile does not reach its target, it will bounce off the arena's walls and become a new threat! Combine precision, anticipation and skill to survive as long as possible and beat the biggest scores in the leaderboard! New aliens and obstacles will disturb your progress as you play, so stay focused! Dangerous Blaster offers short and intense games, you will have to go back several times to achieve impressive scores.
